content.prompt: Both objects shown suggest a belief in an afterlife because both

choices.label: incorporate symbols that were reserved for funeral rituals
combine imagery that represents both human birth and death
were made from precious materials and deposited in graves
were found alongside texts guiding the soul through the underworld

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
